hotels.title: Boutique India Six Senses Wellness Retreat at Himalyan Foothills
hotels.description: Truly immerse yourself in an unparalleled healing journey with Six Senses Vana - a health and wellness retreat just below the Himalayan foothills of Mussoorie in India's north. Set across 21 acres of virgin Sal Forest, this modern-day temple of wellness prioritises a rebalance of body, mind and soul through lifestyle, herbal medicine and manual therapies in uniquely crafted programs, ranging from Ayurveda and Yoga to Tibetan medicine and natural healing therapies. Each Six Senses Vana experience is curated to suit the needs of individual guests, with an assembly of traditional healers, teachers, health professionals and chefs on board to look after your every need, so that you can focus on rebalance and rejuvenation.
